document_data.name: Trahern
document_data.mainbody: '''Trahern of Oakvale''' was an old [[druid]] in charge of the [[Oakvale]], a small forest in the [[Myrloch Vale]] in the [[Moonshae Isles]] in the mid–14{{th}} century [[DR]].
document_data.Personality: He was proud of his caretaker-ship of the Oakvale.
document_data.History:
In the {{YearlinkName|1345}}, Trahern was corrupted by [[Kazgoroth]] in the disguise of a [[dryad]] so he could show [[Grunnarch|Grunnarch the Red]] and his army a safe and fast passage through Myrloch Vale.

After Kazgaroth's defeat, Trahern searched the pond where Kazgaroth fell and recovered a skull-sized black rock—[[the Heart of Kazgaroth]].

A [[1346|year later]], a feral Trahern found his way to the [[moonwell]] and Myrloch Vale, which was being tended to by [[Robyn Kendrick]] and [[Genna Moonsinger]]. The close proximity to the heart caused Genna to fall ill.
